name: Untracked
description: A utility to selectively untrack progress on specific anime while "Automatically Update Progress" is enabled.
author: nnotwen

fields.name: hidediscord
fields.label: Hide discord activity for untracked entries

fields.name: hentai
fields.label: Disable tracking progress for all Hentai

fields.name: ecchi
fields.label: Disable tracking progress for all Ecchi
